ygData.subject: Re: Xegony
ygData.msgSnippet: I just joined this club and YES i m on Xegony. I m a DEL necro and i must say i do love you druids wolf spell. A high lvl druid changeg all members of my party
ygData.messageBody:
I just joined this club and YES i'm on Xegony.
I'm a DEL necro and i must say i do love you druids
wolf spell. A high lvl druid changeg all members of my
party into wolf form and it was such a trip. As soon as
the 2 new severs go in I entend to start a druid
character. I've only been playing EQ since X-mass and it has
totally taken over my life. I haven't been to the movies
in a month and i once stayed up and played for 2
days. My question is does the mania ever stop? I even
have my Mom who never plays games addicted. We fight
over the computer. This game has too much power, but
who am i to complain....It's so much
fun!<br><br>~Aeday <Dark Legion><br>lvl 14 DEL Necro<br>Xegony
Server<br><br>Only the good die young. The bad prefer it that way.
